title: Dual Hook
info: The Dual Hook is a Hardmode grappling hook which is dropped by Mimics (14.29% chance). It reaches 27.5 tiles, and has 2 hooks which can be launched simultaneously; however, only one hook can be attached to a block at any time. Launching a second hook will not release the player from the first hook unless the new hook successfully attaches to a block.
